#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define ll unsigned long long int
#define endl "\n"
int main(){
    //cin.sync_with_stdio(false);
    int t;
    scanf("%d", &t);
    while(t--){
        ll N ;
        //cin >> N ;
        scanf("%lld", &N);
        if( N ==1) {
                printf("0\n");
                continue;
        }
        printf("%lld\n" , (ll)(N*N -2)/2);
    }
}
